mapper.select: SELECT m.messageNo, m.content, m.senderId, m.chatRoomNo, m.isReceived, m.createdAt FROM Message m JOIN ChatRoom c ON m.chatRoomNo = c.chatRoomNo WHERE c.customer = #{customer} AND c.storeNo = #{storeNo} ORDER BY m.createdAt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Message (content, senderId, chatRoomNo) VALUES (#{content}, #{senderId}, #{chatRoomNo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.messageNo, m.content, m.senderId, m.chatRoomNo, m.isReceived, m.createdAt, s.MEMBER_USERNAME AS owner FROM Message m JOIN ChatRoom cr ON m.chatRoomNo = cr.chatRoomNo JOIN Store s ON cr.storeNo = s.storeNo WHERE m.chatRoomNo = #{chatRoomNo} ORDER BY m.createdAt ASC
